price: y ni siquiera pudieron ponerse de pie ni defenderse.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
